price: 48. Mpe ye nde azali kotinda mopepe lokola elaka ya ngolu naye. Sima akitisi kowuta na yango mayi ya peto (kowuta o likolo),
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan ṭahūran
